cause.description:
The whole point behind the group is to lower the costs of education, so that more lower class citizens can be allowed to go to college, so that they are not stuck in a dead end job all their life.
1. To lower tuition fees
2. To provide more people more education
3. To lessen the stress felt by lower class citizens
cause.mission: Lower the costs of higher education
cause.name: Higher Education is a right not a luxury
